front.title: Quality of Service Extension to Dynamic MANET OnDemand Routing Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to the Dynamic MANET On-demand (DYMO) routing protocol in order to enable mobile nodes to discover and maintain QoS routes. DYMO is a reactive (on-demand) routing protocol designed for use by mobile nodes in multi-hop wireless ad hoc networks. Extensions of this document include the necessary additions to the routing table and DYMO routing messages.
